modal.advanced_search_help_booleans: Include/exclude search terms: Prefixing a term with + means that this term must be present; terms prefixed with - must not be present.
modal.advanced_search_help_by_id: Search by page, file and folder id If you enter an ID, the system searches for objects with exactly this ID
modal.advanced_search_help_by_name:
Search by name
You can restrict the search to the names of pages, files and folders
modal.advanced_search_help_by_nice_url:
Search by Nice URL
You can restrict the search to the Nice URLs of pages.
modal.advanced_search_help_direct_page:
Direct page search:
You can navigate directly to a page by entering either the page id or the live url of that page.
modal.advanced_search_help_further_info: Further information and examples can be found in the Elastic documentation.
modal.advanced_search_help_full_text:
Contentsearch
You can restrict the search to the content of pages and files.
modal.advanced_search_help_fuzzy: Search for similar terms: By adding a tilde (~) after a term, you can search for terms which are similar to, but not exactly matching, that term.
modal.advanced_search_help_lead: Typing in the search bar filters the items in the current view. Press "Enter" to run a full text search. In addition, you can use the following search operators:
modal.advanced_search_help_wildcards: Wildcard search: A wildcard search uses placeholders to represent unspecified characters. Use ? to replace a single character, and * to replace zero or more characters.

modal.link_template_body:
Please select how you want to apply the changes:
  • {{labelAppend}}: Link the selected Templates without additional changes
  • {{labelApply}}: Apply the current selection and unlink not selected Templates
modal.choose_localization_type_body:
Please choose the type of localization.
  • Full localization: The entire page with all it's contents is localized and can be edited.
  • Partial localization: Root-Tags can be localized individually, all other content is being inherited.
modal.save_tag_inheritance_body:
Changes to existing inheritance settings may lead to the loss of already localized content.
Do you wish to continue?
